attributes.action: Nia's journey,Earlier screening for women who's family has a history of breast cancer
attributes.additional_details: Nia Roberts a newly wed with a young son lost her battle with breast cancer' Unfortunately her family has a history of cancer, she lost her maternal grandmother and her own mother to the disease. Nia's quest was to have young women that have a family history to be screened at an earlier age so hopefully more lives can be saved and less children lose their loved ones. Please do something to help families like hers.
